title: I feel like everyone despises top laners.
body:
I mean, its one of the main sources for 'OP' champions.

We got other people like {{champion:1}} , {{champion:268}}, etc., but every time I play any top laner, from {{champion:92}} to fucking {{champion:98}}, if I get fed, everyone says "LOL think ur so good just playing op champ noob." And I'm like wtf?

I mean, here's a list of top-lane champs I've seen people call OP:
{{champion:266}} {{champion:84}} {{champion:31}} {{champion:122}} {{champion:131}} {{champion:245}} {{champion:36}} {{champion:28}} {{champion:114}} {{champion:105}} {{champion:41}} {{champion:86}} {{champion:150}} {{champion:79}} {{champion:120}} {{champion:74}} {{champion:39}} {{champion:59}} {{champion:24}} {{champion:126}} {{champion:10}} {{champion:121}} {{champion:64}} {{champion:54}} {{champion:11}} {{champion:75}} {{champion:76}} {{champion:56}} {{champion:20}} {{champion:2}} {{champion:80}} {{champion:78}} {{champion:133}} {{champion:58}} {{champion:107}} {{champion:92}} {{champion:68}} {{champion:13}} {{champion:98}} {{champion:102}} {{champion:72}} {{champion:50}} {{champion:48}} {{champion:23}} {{champion:6}} {{champion:8}} {{champion:67}} {{champion:62}} {{champion:5}} {{champion:157}} {{champion:83}} {{champion:154}} {{champion:238}} 

And that's over 75% of the top laner champion base.

Is it just noobs raging when they lose, or do others think these champs are OP too? I've only ever had a problem with Swain, Cho'gath and Vayne there. -Ish Fiora but even then.
And its not just once or twice, I've seen these people called OP plenty of times. Its weird. Especially {{champion:98}}, how is he OP?!
